# Group Booking

**URL:** https://www.mangomint.com/learn/help-articles/calendar/group-booking/

## Category
02 Calendar And Appointments

## Subcategory
Group Booking

## Article Content

HOME
CALENDAR & APPOINTMENTS
GROUP BOOKING
Group Booking

Group booking simplifies the process of booking and checking out multiple clients at the same time.

With group booking, you can book and check out clients who visit together, including friends, families, and groups such as wedding or bridal parties.

Create a group booking from the calendar: Easily book a group of clients from the calendar and check out clients individually or all together.

Book group appointments online: Clients can book group appointments online and select the same or different services and service customizations for each person in the group.

Send individual notifications & forms: Each client in the group will receive their own appointment confirmation, reminders, and forms.

Each client in a group will have their own appointment on the calendar. A group appointment icon allows you to see which appointments are part of a group.

The articles in this section cover group bookings, including creating and checking out group bookings.

In this section:
Enable Group Booking
Create a Group Booking from the Calendar
Create a Group Booking from Existing Appointments
Create a Group Booking from Online Booking
Update an Existing Group Booking
Check In and Check Out a Group Booking
FAQ: Group Booking
Can't find what you're looking for?

Start a chat with us to talk to a real person and get your questions answered, or browse our on-demand videos.
